title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 14 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year

Revenue in million U.S. dollars is gradually constant from 2005/06 to 2011/12, slightly decreasing from 2011/12 to 2012/13, gradually increasing from 2012/13 to 2013/14, and lastly slightly constant from 2013/14 to 2018/19.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012/13 and 2013/14.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 154.0 was recorded at Year 2018/19
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 71.0 was recorded at Year 2006/07
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2008/09 to 2012/13.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2005/06 to 2008/09.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016/17 to 2018/19.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2014/15 to 2016/17.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2012/13 to 2014/15.
